<<<<<<< HEAD
A small treatise concerning swearing in the old time of the law, with its use and an end put to it in the Gospel by Jesus Christ, who forbiddeth all swearing, and sets up yea and nay instead thereof. By G. Fox. Fox, George, 1624-1691.
55, [1] p.
[s.n.], London : printed in the year 1675.
Caption title on p. 5 reads: Concerning swearing. Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
=======

55, [1] p.
[s.n.], London : printed in the year 1675.
